title: Welcome to My Blog
content:
Hello World!

This is my first blog post. I'm excited to share my thoughts and experiences with you.

This blog system is powered by Next.js 13+ and can be automatically updated via API calls from external systems like n8n.

Features

  • Automatic blog posting via API
  • SEO-friendly URLs
  • Dynamic routing
  • Responsive design

Stay tuned for more content!
